thread.title: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio
thread.title_full: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio

title: Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio
text:
Updated: 10:59 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 | Posted: 10:59 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 Montel Williams to back effort to legalize pot in Ohio Montel Williams in Harrisburg View Larger FILE - In this Oct. 18, 2012 file photo, Montel Williams is interviewed at the Arkansas state Capitol in Little Rock. An effort to legalize medical and recreational marijuana in Ohio is getting the backing of Williams. The celebrity who hosted "The Montel Williams Show" for a decade is scheduled to endorse Issue 3 during a Columbus appearance Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. (AP Photo/Danny Johnston) Sponsored Links The Associated Press COLUMBUS, Ohio â€” 
An effort to legalize medical and recreational marijuana in Ohio is getting the backing of TV personality Montel Williams. 
The celebrity who hosted "The Montel Williams Show" for a decade is scheduled to endorse Issue 3 during a Columbus appearance Wednesday. Williams also will announce opposition to Issue 2, a proposed ban on constitutional monopolies that's designed to block the marijuana effort. 
Wednesday's event will include Ohio patients who could benefit from access to medical marijuana if the amendment passes Nov. 3. 
A spokesman said Williams does not intend to be an investor in any of the 10 authorized growing sites created by the proposal and has no current plans to be involved in the Ohio cannabis business. 
___ 
This story has been corrected to show that this is not Williams' first time getting involved in a marijuana legalization effort. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
